About the Company: Gufic Biosciences Ltd. is engaged in diversified business viz. Pharma, Healthcare, Bio- Technology, Seeds, Herbal etc.The company started their plant biotechnology operation three years ago to produce and supply the high yielding and elite planting material of medicinal and other herbal plants using tissue culture techniques.Gufic seeds deals in all major vegetable seeds namely, tomato, chilli, cabbage, cauliflower, capsicum, coriander, bhendi, bottle gourd, bitter gourd, ridge gourd, brinjal, cucumber and watermelon..The company also in the business activities of Consumer, Bulk Drugs, Formulations.
